{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06789v1", "title": "When is the partial map classifier a Sierpiński cone?", "summary": "We study the relationship between partial map classifiers, Sierpi\'nski
cones, and axioms for synthetic higher categories and domains within univalent
foundations. In particular, we show that synthetic $\infty$-categories are
closed under partial map classifiers assuming Phoa's principle, and we isolate
a new reflective subuniverse of types within which the Sierpi\'nski cone (a lax
colimit) can be computed as a partial map classifier by strengthening the Segal
condition.", "main_category": "cs.LO", "categories": "cs.LO,cs.PL,math.CT", "published": "2025-04-09T11:27:54Z"}
